34.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.
I will, wish, desire, am willing, intend, design.
(a) way, manner, (b) manner of life, character.
I will, wish, desire, am willing, intend, design.

35.long: I see, look upon, experience, perceive, discern, beware.

35.brief: I send away, release, remit, forgive, permit
35.long: (a) I send away, (b) I let go, release, permit to depart, (c) I remit, forgive, (d) I permit, suffer.
(a) a house, the material building, (b) a household, family, lineage, nation.
(denoting speech in progress), (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

35.brief: but, on the other hand, and
35.long: a weak adversative particle, generally placed second in its clause; but, on the other hand, and.
I see, look upon, experience, perceive, discern, beware.
(a) conj: until, (b) prep: as far as, up to, as much as, until.
I have come, am present, have arrived.
(denoting speech in progress), (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
(lit: I speak well of) I bless; pass: I am blessed.
